column3: Thanks, however this can't be merged as is (commit message needs fixing, PR title & description need fixing). If you'd like to contribute I'd suggest checking out the [good first issue](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3A%22good+first+issue%22) label and reading through [contributing.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
